articles.title: Congratulatory Letters and Gifts to Kim Jong Il
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Party Delegations and Delegate
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letters and Gifts to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received congratulatory letters and gifts from Norodom Ranariddh, chairman of the PUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, Chea Sim, chairman of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia, and the leader of the People's Liberation Front of Sri Lanka, on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 He was presented with gifts by the National Executive Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, the Central Committee of the All India Forward Bloc and the People's Liberation Front of Sri Lanka.    
 The congratulatory letters and gifts were conveyed to officials concerned by the heads of delegations and delegates of the above-said parties on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses Japan of Seeking Crafty Political Aim
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Foreign Party Delegations and Delegate 
    Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by the secretary general of the People's Unity Party of Tunisia, the delegation of the People's Party of Cambodia and the delegation of the Nepali Congress (Democratic) on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 The gifts were conveyed to officials concerned by heads of the delegations and delegate.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
Letter to Kim Jong Il from Participants in Joint Meeting
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan 
    Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a compatriotic talk with a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 55th anniversary of the DPRK led by So Man Sul, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Chongryon deputies to the SPA including Ryang Su Jong and Kim So Ja, vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and Chongryon heroes including twice hero of labor Pak Hui Dok, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on September 10.
 Present there were officials concerned.

articles.title: Joint Meeting of Organizations for Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People
Yon Hyong Muk Meets Pulikovski
Reception Given for Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Yon Hyong Muk Meets Pulikovski 
    Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- Yon Hyong Muk, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on September 10 met and had a friendly talk with Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far Eastern Region of the Russian Federation, and his party.
 The presidential envoy conveyed to Yon Hyong Muk a personal letter to leader Kim Jong Il from Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation.    
 Present there were First Vice-Minister Kang Sok Ju and Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung of Foreign Affairs and other officials concerned, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Gennadievich Karlov and embassy officials.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Terminate Its Military Presence in S. Korea
Welcome Committee of Koreans in Russia Inaugurated
Performance of Shanghai Ballet Troupe
articles.content:
Welcome Committee of Koreans in Russia Inaugurated
    Pyongyang, September 11 (KCNA) -- A Committee of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia for Welcoming the Reelection of the Great Leader General Kim Jong Il as Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was formed on September 4.
 The welcome committee discussed and decided on a plan to hold various functions including a meeting and a film show till October 10.    
 A Committee of the United Confederation of Koreans in the Far Eastern Region for Welcoming the Reelection of General Kim Jong Il as Chairman of the NDC of the DPRK was also inaugurated on September 5.

articles.title: Russian Presidential Envoy and His Party Feted
Pulikovski and His Party Leave
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
Swedish King on Developing Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received gifts from Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, the Australian friendship delegation headed by Chairman of the Victoria Branch of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange Stephen Gibson and Charles Doerner, chairman of the Luxembourg-Korea Friendship Association on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of its 55th birthday.
 He was also presented with gifts by the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, the Swiss Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Pyongyang Cultural Interchange Centre in Lausane, Switzerland.    
 The gifts were handed to officials concerned.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Nepalese King Pays Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Swedish King on Developing Relations with DPRK
    Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Carl Gustaf XVI, king of Sweden, expressed the expectation that the relations between Sweden and the DPRK would expand and develop in the interests of the two peoples in the future, referring to the recent brisk exchange between the two countries in various domains, when receiving credentials from new DPRK Ambassador to Sweden Jon In Chan on Sept. 4.
 He hoped that outstanding issues including the inter-Korean relations and the DPRK-U.S. relations would be settled peacefully through negotiations and wished the Korean people prosperity.

articles.title: KCNA Refutes U.S. Brigandish Demand
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Nepalese King Pays Congratulatory Visit to DPRK Embassy
    Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- Sardha Prasad Pradan, secretary in charge of personal affairs of the Nepalese royal palace, paid a congratulatory visit to the DPRK embassy on Sept. 5 in the capacity of a special envoy of the king on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the DPRK.
 The special envoy conveyed to the DPRK ambassador greetings of the king to leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Reception
Meeting of Board of Northeastern Asian Telecommunications Company Held
Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Meeting of Board of Northeastern Asian Telecommunications Company Held
    Pyongyang, September 10 (KCNA) -- The 14th meeting of the Board of the Northeastern Asian Telecommunications Company was held here from September 7 to 10.
 Present at the meeting were Jingjai Hanchanlash, executive vice-president of the Loxley Public Company Limited of Thailand and chairman of the Board of the Loxley Pacific Company Limited of Thailand, members of the delegation of the Loxley Pacific Company Limited of Thailand and Kim In Chol, vice-chairman of the Board of the Northeastern Asian Telecommunications Company, and members of the board.    
 Discussed at the meeting were the issues related to the operation of communication facilities of the Northeastern Asian Telecommunications Company.
